output.note1: Choose an image corresponding to the type of disease chosen
output.note2: Please note that is not an X-ray image

aboutpage.description: MEDRobo is a radiographic image analysis and disease detection platform that uses artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies to analyze medical images and diagnose diseases. The images are uploaded to the site and analyzed by advanced algorithms to determine the presence of any signs on the image that may indicate disease. The site is constantly updated with the latest technology and innovations in medical image analysis.
